item.title: Integrating Asyncronous iperf3 Tests in Android 11+
item.description: Preamble # I’ve been helping out the Seattle Community Network (SCN), with an ongoing project to build a crowdsourced network performance measurement application for Android.

item.title: Rethinking network congestion (Especially in community networks)
item.description: What is congestion in a network anyway?

item.title: Black Lives Matter
item.description: The fight to end systemic racism, particularly against my Black neighbors in the United States (my home), continues beyond the summer of 2020, beyond the 2020 election, and beyond a blog post.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Over the last few months I’ve re-worked a lot of my own personal infrastructure, and learned a lot along the way.
